title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1505.3 - Fire escapes supplemental to a required means of egress
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1505.3 - Fire escapes supplemental to a required means of egress

State Regulations

Wire, chain, cable, rope fire escapes, vertical ladder and
other fire escapes, supplemental to a required means of egress shall be
maintained in good order and repair, and be structurally safe and free of
obstruction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1505.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
